Posts.Content: Olivelyn wrote: hi guys i know you are not drs and cannot diagnose. i'm here because on 9/11/14 i noticed a bruise/bite/notsure thingy under my breast after a shower. it was a little bigger with yellow healing around it and after a while its gotten smaller. but its still there. i saw my gyne for a well woman and told her i kinda freaked out when i saw this bite/bruise thingy and scheduled myself for diagnostic testing at md anderson undiagnosed clinic which will happen soon. after my breast exam she said to go ahead with the mammagram just to be on the safe side... i'm worried as to what this is. it will be my first mammagram as i am 37, no kids. no other symptoms other than this perplexing dark spot on my breast. does anyone have any thoughts or is this familiar to anyone? thanks. Posts.Title: Is this ibc? Scared. Olivelyn Kicks

Posts.Content: Sep 23, 2014 08:52PM Olivelyn wrote: thanks kicks and mods... I'll let you know what happens after going to md anderson. Fingers crossed. Bless y'all.
